resources.string:
OneRing to find them.
 I always want to know where are my kids and need to take the device out of the "Do not disturb" - muted mode, and find it.

“1ring” as trigger word

Secured , choose who can access. Specify contacts phone numbers to permit and ignore all other. 

 Escalation
 Subsequent trigger within a minute would escalate.

Once - query for location & Opens the app.

Twice - Takes the phone out of the “Do not disturb (muted)”

Thrice - Sets the ring volume to max.
 
 
 
 Tweaks Since it's work in progress, there are tweaks and toggling.
Coded for my personal use. Please use it according to the law and wisely.
